synopsis.text:
And so begins the tale of Tetsuya, an unsuspecting photojournalist, who finds himself in the throes of an unexpected alien invasion. Amidst the chaos, he crosses paths with a fierce and scantily-clad alien princess named Kahm, who wields her sword with deadly precision. After an unexpected skirmish, Tetsuya awakens aboard her starship to discover that he has been chosen as Kahm's future husband.

As the groom-to-be, Tetsuya is thrust into a whirlwind of intergalactic politics and peril. Kahm's father, the formidable emperor, vehemently opposes their union, leaving the couple to navigate treacherous obstacles in order to secure their marriage. With the fate of the Earth hanging in the balance and the wrath of the empire to contend with, Tetsuya and Kahm, along with their loyal friends, must fight to protect their love and ensure Tetsuya's survival. Will they triumph against the odds, or will their love story be doomed from the start? Join Tetsuya and Kahm on their thrilling journey filled with action, adventure, and romance!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
